titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: OESOPHAGECTOMY OESOPHAGEAL CONDUIT NECROSIS FAILURE TYPE - Description

div.p: The type of oesophageal conduit necrosis failure during the Oesophagectomy (the surgical removal of all or part of the oesophagus) during an Upper Gastrointestinal Cancer Care Spell.
OESOPHAGECTOMY OESOPHAGEAL CONDUIT NECROSIS FAILURE TYPE is required where the INTERNATIONAL ESOPHAGEAL DATABASE SURGICAL COMPLICATIONS National Code is 'Conduit necrosis/failure requiring surgery '.
